use.flag: Add support for touchpad and sensor handling via SDL. Adds support for any controller supported by SDL
Use mbedtls instead of OpenSSL as part of Chiaki lib

pkgmetadata.longdescription: Chiaki-NG (Next-Generation ) is a Free and Open Source Software Client for PlayStation 4 and PlayStation 5 Remote Play for Linux, FreeBSD, OpenBSD, Android, macOS, Windows, Nintendo Switch and potentially even more platforms.
